mapper.select: SELECT A.INPUTDATE, C.QUESTION_TEXT, B.RESULT, B.VOICEFILENAME FROM INTERVIEW A, INTERVIEW_RESULT B, QUESTION C WHERE A.INTERVIEW_NUM = B.INTERVIEW_NUM AND C.QUESTION_NUM = B.QUESTION_NUM AND A.INTERVIEW_NUM IN (select interview_num from interview_result GROUP BY INTERVIEW_NUM having count(*)=5) ORDER BY a.inputdate DESC
